testimonials.title: What Our Students Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real feedback from students who transformed their learning experience

testimonial1.text: Testora's AI-powered questions helped me understand concepts I struggled with for months. The personalized approach made all the difference.
testimonial1.author: Sarah Johnson

testimonial2.text: The smart study plans kept me organized and motivated. I improved my exam scores by 40% in just 3 months.
testimonial2.author: Ahmed Hassan

testimonial3.text: Best learning platform I've ever used. The progress tracking feature helps me stay on top of my goals.
testimonial3.author: Maria Rodriguez

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Learning?
cta.description: Join thousands of students who are already achieving their academic goals with Testora.
